doc.field: Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland

This series pulls together varied documents that were stored in loose files and binders. They include correspondence, ephemera, some photographs, clippings, and general subject files relating to Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland activities, events, interests, projects, and outings. A small collection of artifacts--largely medals depicting Queen Wilhelmina of the Netherlands--rounds out the series.
Records of the Society of Daughters of Holland Dames, Descendants of the Ancient and Honorable Families of New Netherland
